t: A song of ascents. Of David.
If*pn the Lord*s had not been on our side— let*ld Israel say—
if*ln the Lord*s had not been on our side when*ld people attacked us,
they*ln would have swallowed us alive when*ld their anger flared against us;
the*ln flood would have engulfed us, the*ld torrent would have swept over us,
the*ln raging waters would*ld have swept us away.
Praise*pn be to the Lord,*s who*ld has not let us be torn by their teeth.
We*ln have escaped like a bird from*ld the fowler’s snare; the*ln snare has been broken, and*ld we have escaped.
Our*ln help is in the name of the Lord,*s the*ld Maker of heaven and earth.
